The perfect game. It always brings nostalgia for back in the days.

Its not CS thats the problem... Counter Strike Global Offensive is excellent! The problem is Steam/MatchMaking and the ranking system/AI. It's a commonly understood phenomenon that SoloQ is recipe for disaster. If I get 7 games in a row where players in my team abandon for reasons like "My mum is calling" or "I am hungry so I am going" or "The other team is cheating"... why do I suffer? We get penalised by Q'ing with cheating randoms (a feature introduced by Steam last year) so we lose Elo... but when I lose to a cheater... do I get extra positive Elo? Play CS GO guys... either LAN or FaceIt!
NO GAME CAN BEAT THIS GAME
